dao

Class FlightPlansGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • dao.FlightPlansGenerator

  • public class FlightPlansGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    Searches and calculates valid flight plans given search criteria via a SearchParam object
    Author:
    Team G

      • FilterFlightsList

        public java.util.ArrayList<Flight> FilterFlightsList(FlightPlan originPlan,
                                                     java.util.ArrayList<Flight> unfiltered,
                                                     int level,
                                                     char searchType)
        Filters the a given flight list so it gets a valid list of flight legs Makes sure that one a previous leg did not occur before another, that layover time is valid, that there is enough seats of the specified seat type, and that there is no backtracking airports
        Parameters:
        originPlan - Plan that yielded the SearchParams that was used to get the unfiltered list
        unfiltered - list of possible flight legs that occur within a proximity of originPlan
        level - of search the system is in in terms of how many flight legs have been found for originPlan already
        searchType - of search that is going on (by arrival date or departure date)
        Returns:
        a list of valid flight legs

      • FindInitialLists

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<FlightPlan>> FindInitialLists(SearchParams userParams,
                                                                             char searchType)
        Finds the initial lists based on the user-specified search paramters
        Parameters:
        userParams - user-specified user parameters
        searchType - type of search being done (by departure or arrival date)
        Returns:
        returns a list containing 2 lists -- direct flights and valid flight legs

      • GenerateFlightLegs

        public java.util.ArrayList<FlightPlan> GenerateFlightLegs(FlightPlan unconcluded,
                                                          SearchParams searchParams,
                                                          int level,
                                                          char searchType)
        Gets flight legs after initial legs have been established. Recursively calls itself for one more level to get 3rd leg if necessary
        Parameters:
        unconcluded - gets flight plan to search off of
        searchParams - search parameters to search with
        level - of how deep the search is
        searchType - by arrival or departure
        Returns:
        returns list of concluded flight plans

      • GenerateFlightPlans

        public FlightPlans GenerateFlightPlans(SearchParams searchParams,
                                       char searchType)
        Calls proper functions to search with
        Parameters:
        searchParams - user-specified search parameters
        searchType - type of search by arrival or departure
        Returns:
        returns list of concluded flight plans
